name: Survey Sift
description: Advanced Survey Sift application with integrated payment functionalities, robust user management, and a feature-rich admin dashboard. Crafted for survey creation, voting, result analysis, and seamless user interaction.

features.title: Homepage
features.description: Displays featured and latest surveys with static testimonials.

features.title: Public Surveys Page
features.description: Shows all surveys with filtering options by title, category, and vote.

features.title: Survey Details Page
features.description: Provides detailed survey information and allows authorized users to vote, comment, like/dislike, and report.

features.title: Pricing Page
features.description: Integrates a payment system for users to become pro users with role changes upon successful payment.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Supports email/password and social media authentication, JWT tokens, and role-based access control.

name: FreelanceBD
description: Full-stack web application designed for an interactive online marketplace experience. Facilitates the connection between job seekers and employers, streamlining the job search and hiring process.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Users can securely create accounts and log in for a personalized experience.

features.title: Intuitive Job Posting
features.description: Employers can easily post job opportunities with detailed information.

features.title: Bidding System
features.description: Job seekers can place bids on available jobs, specifying their bidding amount and deadline.

features.title: Bid Management
features.description: Users can view and manage their bid requests, track status, and accept or reject bids.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Designed to be responsive for a seamless user experience across devices.

name: Brand Shop
description: Your go-to destination for a seamless and secure online shopping experience. Offers a range of features prioritizing user convenience, product management, and data security.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Enables secure account creation and login with strong password validation.

features.title: Product Management
features.description: Facilitates admin product upload, updates, and comprehensive catalog management.

features.title: Shopping Cart Functionality
features.description: Provides a user-friendly cart with convenient item removal and persistent storage.

features.title: MongoDB Integration
features.description: Efficiently manages product and user data using MongoDB for reliability.

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
features.description: Features an intuitive design and easy navigation for an enhanced user experience.
